items.sentence: It\'s a pity that Tom doesn\'t know how to do that.
It\'s a waste of time to study when you\'re sleepy.
I wanted you to understand what you\'re up against.
It wasn\'t Tom\'s first time to drive a sports car.
The busses are especially crowded during rush hour.
The chance that Tom will get arrested is very slim.
The couple carved their initials into the oak tree.
The doctor told me that I should lose a few pounds.
Tom should know better than to ask Mary for a loan.
Tom splashed Mary, and then Mary splashed him back.
